name: Survive the Night (odeabrian)
description:
Zombie survival prototype with Construct's 3D capabilities. Explore buildings and collect supplies while eliminating the infected. Can you survive the night?

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScSsO-t9o3aes0hXHeDmXMvXHkbrX1R_Tt2mDqRmHyELVrMWw/viewform?usp=sf_link

CONTROLS:

WASD or Arrow Keys

Z to interact with doors

Mouse to aim and shoot
